texto: relationships. Adoption of these management principles is a strategic top management decision. It affirms the relationship between effective management and realization of financial and economic benefits. Deployment of appropriate methods and tools fosters the development of a consistent systematic approach for addressing financial and economic objectives. Economic benefit is generally attained through effective management of resources and implementation of applicable processes for improving the overall worth and health of the organization.
